statements: UPDATE player_profiles SET game_progress = 75 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_name = 'Alice', game_progress = 50 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_profiles SET game_progress = 75, player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_name = 'Jane Smith', game_progress = 90 WHERE player_id = 202;
UPDATE player_profiles SET username = 'new_username' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE game_progress SET score = 100, level = 2 WHERE player_id = 3 AND game_name = 'Puzzle Game';
UPDATE player_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE game_progress SET score = 1000, level = 5 WHERE player_id = 3 AND game_name = 'Tetris';
UPDATE PlayerProfiles SET level = 10, experience = 500 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE GameProgress SET progress = '50%' WHERE player_id = 12345 AND game_id = 'game1';
UPDATE PlayerProfiles SET level = 20, experience = 5000 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE GameProgress SET last_played = '2022-01-15 08:30:00', score = 1000 WHERE game_id = 201 AND player_id = 101;
UPDATE player_profiles SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_progress SET level_completed = 5, score = 300 WHERE player_id = 2 AND game_id = 1;
UPDATE player_profiles SET date_of_birth = '1990-05-15', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE player_id = 1234;
UPDATE player_progress SET level_completed = 10, score = 5000 WHERE player_id = 1234 AND game_id = 5678;
UPDATE players SET player_experience = 10000 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE games SET game_rating = 4.5, game_genre = 'Action' WHERE game_id = 3;
UPDATE player_progress SET total_score = total_score + 100 WHERE player_id = 1 AND game_id = 5;
UPDATE player_achievements SET achieved_date = CURRENT_DATE WHERE player_id = 3 AND achievement_id = 2;
